1091358615900872706.text:
Me and @yahgwai thought of a way to reduce the financial cost of a dispute to a "nearly" constant cost. We wrote it up a short paper to get the idea to the community asap. 
https://nms.kcl.ac.uk/patrick.mccorry/stateassertions.pdf …

It should be pluggable into the @statechannels design which is also exciting .pic.twitter.com/WfW8U2wrf7

1080425038879342593.text: Let's build a blockchain-assisted MUD. Three approaches I'm taking: @statechannels, @loomnetwork plasma, and @ParityTech substrate. Being developed in parallel. 1072692053182636034.text: While working on @statechannels we've tested out a bunch of example apps. Here's @yahgwai's review for building a state channel based mixing service based on MixEth. 1108075359294099456.text:
8. Interested in learning more?

 All the code: http://github.com/counterfactual 
 Discord: http://counterfactual.com/chat

1108074914433642497.text:
7. Counterfactual isn't just useful for games - these are just simple demo examples. 

We're talking to teams that want to use the framework to build better exchanges, financial services, and protocols of many kinds.

1108074682572595201.text: 6. Here's the cool thing: you've only opened one channel, but are playing two games inside of it. With Counterfactual, you can install, play, and uninstall as many apps as you want without ever going on-chain.

1108074513428869140.text:
5. That's it! You're in. There are two example applications in the Playground you can play today - Tic Tac Toe, and High Roller. 

You can play both with no fees and no waiting for blocks.

1108074373863432193.text: 4. Using the Playground is easy: you create an account using @metamask_io, which creates your state channel, and collateralize that channel with testnet ETH.

1108074130941902848.text: 3.  We built the Playground for developers: it's a complete demo that shows how the entire framework fits together, a roadmap for how you can use it to build your own app.

1108073959935934465.text: 2. Counterfactual is a framework that makes it easy to build apps using generalized state channels, a powerful layer 2 scaling technology. Read more in our launch blogpost →https://medium.com/statechannels/development-update-3-counterfactual-playground-release-f428be4b8950 …

1006882203245031429.text: great summary of some of the key points in our paper from @sinahabhttps://twitter.com/sinahab/status/1006692701084045312 …

1006549052517961728.text: 9. And by the way - we're hiring:https://angel.co/l4ventures/jobs

1006537604542722050.text: 8. The paper is the first big step for Counterfactual. We will be discussing our design at Off the Chain in Berlin on July 1 (https://binarydistrict.com/courses/master-workshop-off-the-chain/ …), and making more announcements soon about our roadmap.

1006537501731971079.text: 7. Second, our design is built to be modular and object-oriented. Dapp developers will not need to “roll their own” state channels construction, but rather rely on pre-built and well-audited modular components from the Counterfactual open framework.

1006537348220444675.text: 6. First, in contrast to existing designs, our state channels allow users to run many applications in parallel inside of a single channel, reducing the need for on-chain fees every time a user wants to use a new channelized application.

1006537235594993666.text: 5. The framework described in our paper was designed to address these shortcomings:

1006537072956538885.text: 4. Despite this, they are underutilized. We believe there are two primary reasons: (1) existing designs *still* require too many on-chain operations, and (2) the lack of a standard framework that makes it easy for developers to build them.

1006536884363907077.text: 3. State channels are the foundational technology for useable distributed applications. They can make blockchain operations faster, cheaper, and more private.

1006536790088601600.text: 2. We’ve summarized some of the insights from the paper, and describe our next steps, in this blog post:https://medium.com/statechannels/counterfactual-generalized-state-channels-on-ethereum-d38a36d25fc6 …

1006536423086977024.text: 1. Hello, world! We’ve just published "Counterfactual: Generalized State Channels", our paper describing the most advanced state channels design on ethereum https://counterfactual.com/statechannels
